  1. 363: Feeding birds

    01.01.2012

  2. 360-362: Animals vs. people

    01.01.2012

    I've been counting and there are more 365 photos featuring people than animals. Which surprised me, because on the whole I think I prefer the company of animals.

  3. 359: You could feel the heat coming off this place

    30.12.2011

    This house in Finstall apparently does this every year.

    Steph said they're raising money for something. I guessed it's for the electricity company.

  4. 355-358

    28.12.2011

    Posting these this afternoon because Mum complained that I hadn't posted in a while.

    I was wondering who that visitor from Bromsgrove was.

  5. 353 & 354

    22.12.2011

    Looking forward to not judging my days based on the quality of a photo.

  6. 352: Arrow Valley Lake

    20.12.2011

    I think I might have gone overboard with the processing of some of these. It makes me wonder whether I should just post exactly what comes out of the camera, rather than wasting loads of time on processing only to end up hating what I did.

    Still, a fun Sunday morning at the frozen Arrow Valley Lake.
